section.heading: Effect of indexing errors.
section.text: The failure of the filing office to index a record correctly does not affect the effectiveness of the filed record.

annoGroup.heading: Uniform Commercial Code Comment
annoGroup.text: 2. Effectiveness of Mis-Indexed Records. This section provides that the filing office’s error in mis-indexing a record does not render ineffective an otherwise effective record. As did former Section 9-401, this section imposes the risk of filing-office error on those who search the files rather than on those who file.
